<a name="Identity"></a>
## type [Identity](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/identity/identity.go#L10-L21>)

Identity models an external OAuth account linked to an AREA user

```go
type Identity struct {
    ID           uuid.UUID
    UserID       uuid.UUID
    Provider     string
    Subject      string
    AccessToken  string
    RefreshToken string
    Scopes       []string
    ExpiresAt    *time.Time
    CreatedAt    time.Time
    UpdatedAt    time.Time
}
```

<a name="Identity.TokenExpired"></a>
### func \(Identity\) [TokenExpired](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/identity/identity.go#L24>)

```go
func (i Identity) TokenExpired(now time.Time) bool
```

TokenExpired reports whether the access token is expired relative to now

<a name="Identity.WithTokens"></a>
### func \(Identity\) [WithTokens](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/identity/identity.go#L33>)

```go
func (i Identity) WithTokens(accessToken string, refreshToken string, expiresAt *time.Time, scopes []string) Identity
```

WithTokens returns an updated copy with new OAuth token data applied

<a name="Profile"></a>
## type [Profile](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/identity/profile.go#L4-L11>)

Profile captures the remote identity information returned by an OAuth provider

```go
type Profile struct {
    Provider   string
    Subject    string
    Email      string
    Name       string
    PictureURL string
    Raw        map[string]any
}
```

<a name="Profile.Empty"></a>
### func \(Profile\) [Empty](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/identity/profile.go#L14>)

```go
func (p Profile) Empty() bool
```

Empty reports whether the profile is missing its identifying attributes
